name: Crystal Rose Custom Palette
description: Hand-crafted Crystal Rose palette for VFX effects - no pure white

colors.name: Crystal Pink
colors.usage: Main crystal rose color for primary effects

colors.name: Rose Quartz
colors.usage: Soft rose for gentle magical auras

colors.name: Mystic Purple
colors.usage: Purple crystal effects and magical energy

colors.name: Ethereal Cyan
colors.usage: Bright cyan for magical energy bursts

colors.name: Pearl Pink
colors.usage: Soft pink for gentle magical effects

colors.name: Crystal Green
colors.usage: Nature magic and life force effects

colors.name: Mystic Violet
colors.usage: Deep purple for powerful magical effects

usage_notes: Use Crystal Pink and Rose Quartz for main character effects
Apply Mystic Purple and Violet for powerful magical abilities
Use Crystal Blue and Ethereal Cyan for mystical auras
Apply Crystal Green for nature-based magical effects
Use Crystal Silver for metallic crystal highlights
Apply Magical Gold for divine/ultimate ability effects
